com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class WrapLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.FlowLayout
      • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.WrapLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class WrapLayout
extends java.awt.FlowLayout
    A flow layout that wraps components when they do not fit in the row.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
